originalText.text: Dr Roger Gershon is the most outstanding, caring, kind, and gifted dentist! He has taken care of me for more than 35 years, and I am now delighted also to see Dr Andrew Gershon, who has joined his father's practice. Roger is the most technology forward person in any medical speciality I've ever known--and the office culture is warm, meticulous, sensitive, and super professional. Except beautiful teeth, a warm blanket if you need it, and a painless experience. I love my smile!

text.text: Dr Roger Gershon is the most outstanding, caring, kind, and gifted dentist! He has taken care of me for more than 35 years, and I am now delighted also to see Dr Andrew Gershon, who has joined his father's practice. Roger is the most technology forward person in any medical speciality I've ever known--and the office culture is warm, meticulous, sensitive, and super professional. Except beautiful teeth, a warm blanket if you need it, and a painless experience. I love my smile!

originalText.text: I saw Dr. Andrew Gershon (the son) as an emergency new patient. He was fantastic. His assistant Donna is very caring and helpful; I felt really comfortable with them. Dr. Gershon explained everything to me in a way that I could understand and helped me make a plan to resolve not only my current issue but my 5-step plan to overall dental health. I will be returning to them for my primary dental care.

text.text: I saw Dr. Andrew Gershon (the son) as an emergency new patient. He was fantastic. His assistant Donna is very caring and helpful; I felt really comfortable with them. Dr. Gershon explained everything to me in a way that I could understand and helped me make a plan to resolve not only my current issue but my 5-step plan to overall dental health. I will be returning to them for my primary dental care.

originalText.text: What a wonderful experience!! I’ve been dreading a visit to the dentist, but Dr. Gershon and his staff were fabulous!! From the moment I arrived to when I left, everyone was genuinely friendly, caring, and professional. The dental hygienist gave me a great cleaning and had a nice check up with Dr. Gershon. He also gave me great information about my oral health.

text.text: What a wonderful experience!! I’ve been dreading a visit to the dentist, but Dr. Gershon and his staff were fabulous!! From the moment I arrived to when I left, everyone was genuinely friendly, caring, and professional. The dental hygienist gave me a great cleaning and had a nice check up with Dr. Gershon. originalText.text:
I’ve been a patient for over 20 years!
Dr. Gershon has always been gentle, thorough and accommodating. I now see his son and I am pleased to say He is Amazing! He understands my fear of the dentist and walked me through every step!

Diane, the office manager is always accommodating and helpful.
Dana the Dentist assistant is also Amazing!Elida the hygienist does the best cleanings!

So if your looking this is the right Dentist for you!

originalText.text: Roger Gershon is my father’s longtime dentist and now he and Andrew are my dentists. I have had a lovely experience with both of them. The staff at Gershon Dental are very friendly and professional. Andrew Gershon was particularly helpful recently planning my wisdom teeth removal.
